/ one grey ground plane
m .2 .2 .2 .4 .4 .4 10. .9 .9 .9
p 0.0 1.0 0.0 40.0
p 0.0 0 1 150
 
/ one point light
l p 0. 200. -80 1.0 1.0 1.0

/l a .01 .01 .01
 
/ camera: pointing towards -Z, 35mmx25mm "film", 35mm focal length
/ making 160x120 pixels
c 0 20 250 0.0 0.0 -1.0 35.0 35.0 25.0 640 480
